properties.areaDesc: 5NM East of a line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage; Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 24 at 4:06AM EST until January 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...East winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and waves
3 to 6 feet expected.

* WHERE...Seul Choix Point to Point Detour MI and 5NM East of a
line from Fairport MI to Rock Island Passage.

* WHEN...From noon today to 7 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY
